targets.rawSql:
WITH queries_per_second AS
    (
        SELECT
            event_time,
            count() AS queries
        FROM system.query_log
        WHERE event_time > yesterday()
        GROUP BY 1
    )
SELECT
    toStartOfFiveMinutes(event_time),
    avg(queries)
FROM queries_per_second
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT query, avg(written_bytes) FROM system.query_log
WHERE event_date in (today(), yesterday()) AND query_kind = 'Insert'
group by 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT query, avg(written_rows) FROM system.query_log
WHERE event_date in (today(), yesterday()) AND query_kind = 'Insert'
group by 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT query, avg(read_bytes) FROM system.query_log
WHERE event_date in (today(), yesterday()) AND query_kind = 'Select'
group by 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT query, avg(read_rows) FROM system.query_log
WHERE event_date in (today(), yesterday()) AND query_kind = 'Select'
group by 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT query, sum(memory_usage) FROM system.query_log
WHERE event_date in (today(), yesterday()) AND query_kind = 'Select' AND type = 'QueryFinish'
    and user != 'monitoring-internal'
group by 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Top select queries by memory usage

targets.rawSql:
SELECT query, avg(query_duration_ms) FROM system.query_log
WHERE event_date in (today(), yesterday())
group by 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 25;
SELECT initial_user , count(query) as QUERIES FROM system.query_log WHERE event_date in (today(), yesterday()) GROUP BY initial_user ORDER BY QUERIES DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT
    database,
    `table`,
    formatReadableSize(sum(data_uncompressed_bytes)) AS uncompressed_size,
    formatReadableSize(sum(data_compressed_bytes)) AS compressed_size,
    sum(data_uncompressed_bytes) / sum(data_compressed_bytes) AS compression_ratio
FROM system.parts
WHERE database != 'system'
GROUP BY
    1,
    2
ORDER BY 3 DESC

targets.queryText:
WITH queries_per_second AS
    (
        select DATE_TRUNC('SECOND', start_time) as start_time, count(1) as queries from snowflake.account_usage.query_history where start_time > DATEADD('day', -1, current_timestamp) GROUP BY 1
    )
select TIME_SLICE(start_time::TIMESTAMP_NTZ, 5, 'MINUTE', 'START')::TIMESTAMP_LTZ, avg(queries) FROM queries_per_second
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC;
select usage_date, sum(USAGE_IN_CURRENCY) from snowflake.organization_usage.USAGE_IN_CURRENCY_DAILY where usage_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) group by 1 order by 1;

SELECT DATE_PART('HOUR', start_time) AS start_hour,
  warehouse_name,
  AVG(credits_used_compute) AS credits_used_compute_avg
FROM snowflake.account_usage.warehouse_metering_history
WHERE start_time >= DATEADD(day, -10, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())
  AND warehouse_id > 0  -- Skip pseudo-VWs such as "CLOUD_SERVICES_ONLY"
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1, 2;

panels.title: Avg Credit Usage (hour by hour) last 10 days

targets.queryText:
SELECT warehouse_name,
  SUM(credits_used_compute) AS credits_used
FROM snowflake.account_usage.warehouse_metering_history
WHERE start_time >= DATEADD(day, -10, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

select query_text, avg(bytes_written) from snowflake.account_usage.query_history where start_time > DATEADD('day', -1, current_timestamp) and query_text != '<redacted>' and query_type = 'INSERT' group by 1 order by 2 desc limit 25;

select query_text, avg(rows_produced) from snowflake.account_usage.query_history where start_time > DATEADD('day', -1, current_timestamp) and query_text != '<redacted>' and query_type = 'INSERT' and ROWS_PRODUCED is not null group by 1 order by 2 desc limit 25;

select query_text, avg(bytes_scanned) from snowflake.account_usage.query_history where start_time > DATEADD('day', -1, current_timestamp) and query_text != '<redacted>' and query_type = 'SELECT' group by 1 order by 2 desc limit 25;

select query_text, avg(rows_produced) from snowflake.account_usage.query_history where start_time > DATEADD('day', -1, current_timestamp) and query_text != '<redacted>' and query_type = 'SELECT' and ROWS_PRODUCED is not null group by 1 order by 2 desc limit 25;
select user_name, count(1) as queries from snowflake.account_usage.query_history where start_time > DATEADD('day', -1, current_timestamp) group by user_name order by 2 desc;

select query_text, avg(total_elapsed_time) from snowflake.account_usage.query_history where start_time > DATEADD('day', -1, current_timestamp) and query_text != '<redacted>' group by 1 order by 2 desc limit 25;

targets.rawSql: select query, calls, total_exec_time, mean_exec_time from pg_stat_statements order by mean_exec_time desc limit 20;
SELECT query, rows/calls AS avg_rows FROM pg_stat_statements ORDER BY avg_rows DESC LIMIT 25
SELECT query, (8192 * shared_blks_written)/calls AS avg_bytes FROM pg_stat_statements WHERE shared_blks_written > 0 ORDER BY avg_bytes DESC LIMIT 25
select pa.rolname, sum(calls) as queries from pg_stat_statements pss inner join pg_authid pa on pss.userid = pa.oid group by 1 order by 2 desc limit 25;
SELECT query, (8192 * shared_blks_read)/calls AS avg_bytes FROM pg_stat_statements WHERE shared_blks_read > 0 ORDER BY avg_bytes DESC LIMIT 25
